file.name: openapi-3.0.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: tenant-security
  description: "Parent pom providing dependency and plugin management for applications\n\
    \t\tbuilt with Maven"
  version: 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT
servers:
- url: http://localhost
tags: []
paths:
  /context:
    get:
      tags:
      - context
      operationId: context/get-context-by-token
      parameters:
      - name: Authorization
        in: header
        description: JSON Web Token
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        example: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCIgOiAiSldUIiwia2lkIiA6ICJrQmdOR0oxUU9HczJnWlo3bEIyQmU5d1JLY01zeWl3a3dnWmQ3Vjg0WGFzIn0..ofPYqZjO-jyYuKCsEGDDcr-ef7Wxrxst3mbGJRZwSvGiczEM6SRxmlTGmW2Z0xGTb1W-XOVmWWZby182fTibCh03MAKhK7cGTILpt26iohEahmMbPS-iFTO7UpSJ_f3pvT54OmjKdhabdFSiY78Pa7Cz2oxx-0VtqjmZSIeSS1dB9ecy2rnlQyh56ubz4U2Pyy3X9qOXoERiSwZCpGFzXYfTYb7TcOpzseIIRQcHaS6mH-UOGj_L4ghwiAcZg21OQWbyZAG4IOIpwe1rX-EDB4vukD-EIAGvePIG33JiMNgtEhFHbFv3980p8AnxrE64XxXZBoWsSvwA9j-JeNaPgw
      responses:
        200:
          description: "200"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/context-1041425929'
              examples:
                context/get-context-by-token:
                  value: "{\r\n  \"user\" : {\r\n    \"id\" : \"7b04f52c-89bd-4cc6-8a45-0b318d2e9e77\"\
                    ,\r\n    \"email\" : \"3d4fb560-b7c4-4a3a-a522-514543829900@gmail.com\"\
                    ,\r\n    \"firstName\" : \"Alexey\",\r\n    \"lastName\" : \"\
                    Izmaylov\",\r\n    \"credential\" : \"*****\"\r\n  },\r\n  \"\
                    tenants\" : [ {\r\n    \"name\" : \"123b9233-6a5d-46e4-bade-1f697a6c6c6f\"\
                    ,\r\n    \"displayedName\" : \"tenant 2\",\r\n    \"description\"\
                    \ : \"2\"\r\n  }, {\r\n    \"name\" : \"a6398d1c-1ce3-45c8-9f9f-8d24c1c8a71b\"\
                    ,\r\n    \"displayedName\" : \"tenant 1\",\r\n    \"description\"\
                    \ : \"1\"\r\n  }, {\r\n    \"name\" : \"57357137-5e47-46ec-b2b7-0d274e738087\"\
                    ,\r\n    \"displayedName\" : \"tenant 3\",\r\n    \"description\"\
                    \ : \"3\"\r\n  } ]\r\n}"
      security:
      - bearerAuthJWT: []
  /context/tenant:
    post:
      tags:
      - context
      operationId: context/create-tenant-and-assign-to-current-user
      parameters:
      - name: Authorization
        in: header
        description: JSON Web Token
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        example: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCIgOiAiSldUIiwia2lkIiA6ICJrQmdOR0oxUU9HczJnWlo3bEIyQmU5d1JLY01zeWl3a3dnWmQ3Vjg0WGFzIn0..gWjWo3RBopUz-AKgYeTEJ3WMTkZ2lz9PPePZjG3CrGi8FfaYdrs98NxVLBUE4PN485lYzD05mT8elx8zLHjbYE-OImXHRoHc5lsvbIA9gteDF8XwEcwKsqww_9juhHqshbIB99u8bYRsQRl3VqrlBuvzYT9cQ7Yv29GudVirZzXTt3ihi4pfqxG8azGbSOH2cbJPSwJ9ItJS7xwZQW5YG1J4QKLyqiPbb7uYmSkANKfvS2TNBJ5gZIfDlA5zLcShPerPhOEOnn-J2rmU76D22WNDLom1wtmv98XC30sKdKVL_Ts15tMqkmWMjBApAV-kzzkZAVfrW5wRPqiF_PgVPQ
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/tenant-1072526318'
            examples:
              context/create-tenant-and-assign-to-current-user:
                value: "{\r\n  \"name\" : \"9309523a-caae-4a7c-930a-c0884d899a49\"\
                  ,\r\n  \"displayedName\" : \"Galaxy\",\r\n  \"description\" : \"\
                  Resource group description\"\r\n}"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "200"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/tenant-1072526318'
              examples:
                context/create-tenant-and-assign-to-current-user:
                  value: "{\r\n  \"name\" : \"75277a95-499c-4b2e-9e3b-46fc9ced15ce\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"displayedName\" : \"Galaxy\",\r\n  \"description\" :\
                    \ \"Resource group description\"\r\n}"
      security:
      - bearerAuthJWT: []
  /role:
    get:
      tags:
      - role
      operationId: roles/list
      responses:
        200:
          description: "200"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/role1199510443'
              examples:
                roles/list:
                  value: "[ {\r\n  \"name\" : \"maintainer\"\r\n}, {\r\n  \"name\"\
                    \ : \"owner\"\r\n}, {\r\n  \"name\" : \"developer\"\r\n} ]"
  /tenant:
    get:
      tags:
      - tenant
      operationId: tenants/get-all-tenants
      responses:
        200:
          description: "200"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/tenant-625772535'
              examples:
                tenants/get-all-tenants:
                  value: "[ {\r\n  \"name\" : \"e00df63f-aa56-4b40-8675-f0a1d0a7bfb5\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"displayedName\" : \"My Project\",\r\n  \"description\"\
                    \ : \"top secret\"\r\n}, {\r\n  \"name\" : \"110304fc-f763-458f-becc-735db4bb559d\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"displayedName\" : \"My Project\",\r\n  \"description\"\
                    \ : \"top secret\"\r\n}, {\r\n  \"name\" : \"c8aab573-3192-4a43-9223-39345aa46fda\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"displayedName\" : \"My Project\",\r\n  \"description\"\
                    \ : \"top secret\"\r\n} ]"
    post:
      tags:
      - tenant
      operationId: tenants/post-tenant
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/tenant-1072526318'
            examples:
              tenants/post-tenant:
                value: "{\r\n  \"name\" : \"tenant-name\",\r\n  \"displayedName\"\
                  \ : \"My Project\",\r\n  \"description\" : \"top secret\"\r\n}"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "200"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/tenant-1072526318'
              examples:
                tenants/post-tenant:
                  value: "{\r\n  \"name\" : \"46ba1513-8167-439d-a595-7fb2ba91a578\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"displayedName\" : \"My Project\",\r\n  \"description\"\
                    \ : \"top secret\"\r\n}"
  /tenant/{name}:
    get:
      tags:
      - tenant
      operationId: tenants/get-tenant
      parameters:
      - name: name
        in: path
        description: Name of the tenant to be read
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: "200"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/tenant-1072526318'
              examples:
                tenants/get-tenant:
                  value: "{\r\n  \"name\" : \"d274336d-46c3-47df-b08a-6fbce5df5c5e\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"displayedName\" : \"My Project\",\r\n  \"description\"\
                    \ : \"top secret\"\r\n}"
    delete:
      tags:
      - tenant
      operationId: tenants/delete-tenant
      parameters:
      - name: name
        in: path
        description: Name of the tenant to be deleted
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        204:
          description: "204"
    patch:
      tags:
      - tenant
      operationId: tenants/update-tenant
      parameters:
      - name: name
        in: path
        description: Name of the tenant to be updated
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/tenant-name-379992567'
            examples:
              tenants/update-tenant:
                value: "{\r\n  \"name\" : \"701e6d45-f3c5-477e-b9be-11f46a05767e\"\
                  ,\r\n  \"displayedName\" : \"Updated Tenant\",\r\n  \"description\"\
                  \ : \"top secret\"\r\n}"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "200"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/tenant-1072526318'
              examples:
                tenants/update-tenant:
                  value: "{\r\n  \"name\" : \"701e6d45-f3c5-477e-b9be-11f46a05767e\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"displayedName\" : \"Updated Tenant\",\r\n  \"description\"\
                    \ : \"top secret\"\r\n}"
  /user:
    get:
      tags:
      - user
      operationId: users/get-tenant-assignments
      parameters:
      - name: tenant
        in: query
        description: Name of the tenant
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: "200"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/user-id-tenant-811771042'
              examples:
                users/get-tenant-assignments:
                  value: "[ {\r\n  \"tenant\" : \"be762142-af19-4893-9ee2-2085daf00b5d\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"user\" : {\r\n    \"id\" : \"85949e64-ea73-4fd4-b719-d6ca953b0a4c\"\
                    ,\r\n    \"email\" : \"910ffa43-9c16-45c5-bc95-f9605f0c6040@mail\"\
                    ,\r\n    \"firstName\" : \"Mubzseepkk\",\r\n    \"lastName\" :\
                    \ \"Bpizqnhvmb\",\r\n    \"credential\" : \"*****\"\r\n  },\r\n\
                    \  \"roles\" : [ \"developer\" ]\r\n}, {\r\n  \"tenant\" : \"\
                    be762142-af19-4893-9ee2-2085daf00b5d\",\r\n  \"user\" : {\r\n\
                    \    \"id\" : \"9d29b903-7458-4e0d-8a8e-459bd537a61d\",\r\n  \
                    \  \"email\" : \"8faa25f4-743a-49b4-8ee2-6dd5824385e8@mail\",\r\
                    \n    \"firstName\" : \"Zviylqwofl\",\r\n    \"lastName\" : \"\
                    Fdybyjlxom\",\r\n    \"credential\" : \"*****\"\r\n  },\r\n  \"\
                    roles\" : [ \"developer\" ]\r\n}, {\r\n  \"tenant\" : \"be762142-af19-4893-9ee2-2085daf00b5d\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"user\" : {\r\n    \"id\" : \"c0a0e5e3-bc60-4755-af3f-3e3a361fedc8\"\
                    ,\r\n    \"email\" : \"417ee76a-b719-4d60-9919-6c104250534f@mail\"\
                    ,\r\n    \"firstName\" : \"Lnforsqkop\",\r\n    \"lastName\" :\
                    \ \"Gzdiyzipjh\",\r\n    \"credential\" : \"*****\"\r\n  },\r\n\
                    \  \"roles\" : [ \"developer\" ]\r\n} ]"
    post:
      tags:
      - user
      operationId: users/post-user
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/user888266858'
            examples:
              users/post-user:
                value: "{\r\n  \"id\" : \"6341e7f5-ab7c-48fe-a1f6-c5d56b3d3732\",\r\
                  \n  \"email\" : \"jedi@mail\",\r\n  \"firstName\" : \"Obi-Wan\"\
                  ,\r\n  \"lastName\" : \"Kenobi\",\r\n  \"credential\" : \"TheForce\"\
                  \r\n}"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "200"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/user-id1717187775'
              examples:
                users/post-user:
                  value: "{\r\n  \"id\" : \"69416163-b317-4264-8d5f-35a39f0e7931\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"email\" : \"jedi@mail\",\r\n  \"firstName\" : \"Obi-Wan\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"lastName\" : \"Kenobi\",\r\n  \"credential\" : \"*****\"\
                    \r\n}"
  /user/search:
    get:
      tags:
      - user
      operationId: users/search-by-string
      parameters:
      - name: searchingString
        in: query
        description: Username of the user
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: firstName
        in: query
        description: First name of the user
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: lastName
        in: query
        description: Last name of the user
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: email
        in: query
        description: Email of the user
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: userName
        in: query
        description: Username of the user
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: "200"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/user-search651500603'
              examples:
                users/search-by-string:
                  value: "[ {\r\n  \"id\" : \"8f837cfc-8fd6-446e-b4ab-52eeda2d430f\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"email\" : \"5c5a1808-a026-41ee-a2ea-5b8ac0717b0c@mail\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"firstName\" : \"Fon\",\r\n  \"lastName\" : \"Ner\",\r\
                    \n  \"credential\" : \"*****\"\r\n}, {\r\n  \"id\" : \"117bdbc9-e258-4bb3-80d8-78f20231f5d3\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"email\" : \"d3c904f3-8d1b-4535-8780-d3412e05dfae@mail\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"firstName\" : \"Ner\",\r\n  \"lastName\" : \"Zhul\",\r\
                    \n  \"credential\" : \"*****\"\r\n} ]"
                users/search-by-all:
                  value: "[ {\r\n  \"id\" : \"d68908fe-8286-4e6d-89e9-b2c4ae02bcef\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"email\" : \"e7a6fe46-632d-4b72-874e-5b9a5585b265@mail\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"firstName\" : \"Ner\",\r\n  \"lastName\" : \"Zhul\",\r\
                    \n  \"credential\" : \"*****\"\r\n} ]"
  /user/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
      - user
      operationId: users/get-user
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: Id of the user to be read
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: "200"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/user-id1717187775'
              examples:
                users/get-user:
                  value: "{\r\n  \"id\" : \"9220a940-aeac-46f3-902b-a8791b34cce5\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"email\" : \"cfdc17e1-4c60-4a4a-933e-b830f3175bb1@mail\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"firstName\" : \"Gqlusvejlf\",\r\n  \"lastName\" : \"\
                    Fresqfsknn\",\r\n  \"credential\" : \"*****\"\r\n}"
    delete:
      tags:
      - user
      operationId: users/delete-user
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: Id of the user to be deleted
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        204:
          description: "204"
  /user/{id}/tenant:
    get:
      tags:
      - user
      operationId: users/get-user-assignments
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: Id of the user
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: "200"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/user-id-tenant-811771042'
              examples:
                users/get-user-assignments:
                  value: "[ {\r\n  \"tenant\" : \"adedaaf1-c523-4bc2-aa11-a32bf2e6d2d5\"\
                    ,\r\n  \"user\" : {\r\n    \"id\" : \"aef42b7e-4063-4fb7-b095-1598583d4909\"\
                    ,\r\n    \"email\" : \"c9e8cfee-c235-4b6d-99cf-0d052869a42f@mail\"\
                    ,\r\n    \"firstName\" : \"Chksxeykjf\",\r\n    \"lastName\" :\
                    \ \"Jgkqcenuij\",\r\n    \"credential\" : \"*****\"\r\n  },\r\n\
                    \  \"roles\" : [ \"maintainer\", \"developer\" ]\r\n}, {\r\n \
                    \ \"tenant\" : \"159187b0-aeec-48b8-b584-73e4c00e92c9\",\r\n \
                    \ \"user\" : {\r\n    \"id\" : \"aef42b7e-4063-4fb7-b095-1598583d4909\"\
                    ,\r\n    \"email\" : \"c9e8cfee-c235-4b6d-99cf-0d052869a42f@mail\"\
                    ,\r\n    \"firstName\" : \"Chksxeykjf\",\r\n    \"lastName\" :\
                    \ \"Jgkqcenuij\",\r\n    \"credential\" : \"*****\"\r\n  },\r\n\
                    \  \"roles\" : [ \"developer\" ]\r\n} ]"
  /user/{id}/tenant/{tenant-name}/{role}:
    put:
      tags:
      - user
      operationId: users/assign-tenant-to-user
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: Id of user
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: tenant-name
        in: path
        description: Name of tenant
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: role
        in: path
        description: Role of tenant
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: "200"
    delete:
      tags:
      - user
      operationId: users/evict-user-from-tenant
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: Id of the user to be evicted
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: tenant-name
        in: path
        description: Name of tenant
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: role
        in: path
        description: Role of tenant
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: "200"
components:
  schemas:
    tenant-1072526318:
      type: object
      properties:
        displayedName:
          type: string
          description: Displayed name of tenant
        name:
          type: string
          description: Name of tenant
        description:
          type: string
          description: Description
    tenant-name-379992567:
      type: object
      properties:
        displayedName:
          type: string
          description: Displayed name of tenant
        name:
          type: string
          description: Name of tenant (is ignored)
        description:
          type: string
          description: Description
    user-id-tenant-811771042:
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        properties:
          roles:
            type: array
            description: Tenant roles
            items:
              oneOf:
              - type: object
              - type: boolean
              - type: string
              - type: number
          user:
            type: object
            description: User object
          tenant:
            type: string
            description: Name of tenant
        description: Tenant list
    role1199510443:
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        properties:
          name:
            type: string
            description: Name
        description: Role Template List
    user-id1717187775:
      type: object
      properties:
        lastName:
          type: string
          description: Last name of user
        firstName:
          type: string
          description: First name of user
        credential:
          type: string
          description: Masked password or key of user
        id:
          type: string
          description: Id of user
        email:
          type: string
          description: Email of user
    context-1041425929:
      type: object
      properties:
        tenants:
          type: array
          description: Available tenants
          items:
            oneOf:
            - type: object
            - type: boolean
            - type: string
            - type: number
        user:
          type: object
          description: User entity
    tenant-625772535:
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        properties:
          displayedName:
            type: string
            description: Displayed name of tenant
          name:
            type: string
            description: Name of tenant
          description:
            type: string
            description: Description
        description: Tenant list
    user888266858:
      type: object
      properties:
        lastName:
          type: string
          description: Last name of user
        firstName:
          type: string
          description: First name of user
        credential:
          type: string
          description: Password or key of user
        id:
          type: string
          description: Optional id of user
        email:
          type: string
          description: Email of user
    user-search651500603:
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        properties:
          lastName:
            type: string
            description: Last name of user
          firstName:
            type: string
            description: First name of user
          credential:
            type: string
            description: Masked password or key of user
          id:
            type: string
            description: Id of user
          email:
            type: string
            description: Email of user
        description: User list
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuthJWT:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
